Page.Title: Installing LSPDFR
Page.Description: To begin, use the 'Download LSPDFR' button which will take you to the LSPD First Response page. When downloading, ensure to choose the **Manual Install**.

Fields.Field: RAGEPluginHook is already included in the LSPDFR download itself.

Page.Title: Manual Install
Page.Description:
Open the LSPD First Response manual install, and you should see several files and a few folders. Drag and drop all files and folders except the `RPH_Readme.txt` file and the `Licenses` folder into your GTAV folder.
**If prompted, click Replace All Files.**

Button.label: Run LSPDFR for the first time

Page.Title: Run LSPDFR for the first time.
Page.Description: Launch `RAGEPluginHook.exe` in your GTAV folder. It will take you through the first-time setup, and then launch GTAV.

Fields.Field: You have already completed the prologue for GTAV. LSPDFR requires you to be in free-roam to work correctly.

Field.name: I am in game with RAGEPluginHook, however LSPDFR is not loaded?

Fields.Field: You may need to load it in game. Open the RPH console (F4 by default), and type in `LoadPlugin LSPD First Response.dll`.
